text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Administering agency" means an entity that the Department approves in accordance with § 6-414 of this subtitle to administer the Program at the county level.

section.section: "Emergency food provider" means a nonprofit organization or an organization operated by a local government that provides food at no charge to needy individuals.

"Emergency food provider" includes:
a soup kitchen; and
a food pantry.

text.section: "Program" means the Maryland Emergency Food Program.
